family_oriented.reason: Activities are not specifically designed for children or families, focusing more on adult-oriented experiences.

history_oriented.reason: Chinatown tours include visits to cultural landmarks, providing some historical context.

activity_oriented.reason: Activities involve minimal physical exertion, such as light walking and stationary cooking classes.

nature_oriented.reason: Experiences are urban-focused with no connection to nature or outdoor scenic views.

food_oriented.reason: Food is the central focus of the activities, despite mixed reviews on quality.

shopping_oriented.reason: Chinatown tours include visits to markets and bakeries, offering some shopping opportunities.
